attributes.action: Instigate and promote a political and economic system that reflects and ecourages social equality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social equality is the belief that we all should have equal right and responsibility to the earth and its resources and that, social equality can be measured by the equality of access to the decision making proccesses and the equality of access to goods and services. www.declarationofsocialequality.org
